title: Before we begin,
prompt_main_character_default: Firstly, generate a main character who is
prompt_main_character_named: Firstly, the main character's name is
prompt_characters_json_prefix: Fill their names in a JSON array and return only this array. You are not allowed to start the story now.
prompt_story_start: You are a writer and is writing a
prompt_after_story_genre:
novel. You must follow these rules:
- Format is (location)/(speaker)/(mood): (dialogue)/(answers in JSON array)
prompt_after_story_format: - mood can only be one of
prompt_places: - location can only be one of
prompt_end:
- If the dialogue contains a question to the main character, provide up to 3 answers.
- If I provided answers, speaker should not be the main character.
- If speaker is the main character, don't provide any answers.
- You must accept my response.
- All generated dialogues should follow the rules above.
prompt_start_story: You can start the story now. Generate one line of dialogue
prompt_continue: Continue with one line of dialogue.
prompt_continue_with_answer: Continue with one line of dialogue based on the answer:
copyright_note: Images pre-generated using Stable Diffusion with AbyssOrangeMix3
select_api_type: Please select how would you like to access ChatGPT:
select_api_type_note:
- If you choose to use client-side, please make sure you can access OpenAI server. OpenAI may block users accessing outside of allowed areas.
- If you choose to access via our server, we cannot gurantee a smooth experience as OpenAI would rate limit our server.
action_confirmation: Are you sure? You will not able to undo this action.
select_mode_note:
- Classic: You will be given choices.
- Free: You will type your response.
